name: phaser-voice-chat
description: WebRTC voice chat with Phaser and Peerjs.

scripts.buildAllAndStart: cd client/ && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p logs && node server.js | pino-tee warn ./logs/warn.log >> ./logs/all.log
scripts.devbuildAllAndStart: cd client/ && npm run devbuild && cd .. && mkdir -p logs && node server.js | pino-tee warn ./logs/warn-dev.log >> ./logs/all-dev.log

author: asheraryam
